Text:
I thought I inadvertently deleted the module but even after the second download I noticed that the following module is missing:

Module 4: Implementing User, Group, and Computer Accounts

I found a .pdf of this module here:

http://www.carlosrodrigues.info/ESTATIC/_Cursos Microsoft/2279B - Planning, Implementing, and Maintaining a Microsoft Windows Server 2003 Active Directory Infrastructure/6258804.pdf

I have tested this link and it works with no issue; however, if it should not work, just simply type in the exact name of the module in Google.
